UnifyID | https://unify.id | San Francisco | ONSITE | FULLTIME | INTERNS | VISA

Join us in fixing authentication at UnifyID!

Hate passwords? So do we. We believe that within five years, passwords will no longer be the predominant method of authentication.

We are UnifyID, a StartX S15 company that is building a revolutionary identity platform based on implicit authentication. Our solution allows people to identify themselves in a unique way that is extremely difficult to forge or crack. Best of all, we are doing it in a way that respects user privacy.

We are a well-funded security startup in San Francisco and we are looking for enthusiastic builders to get in on the ground floor and work on some of the most challenging technical problems around. The founders are from MIT and Stanford and have worked together on a previous security startup that was successfully acquired. We offer competitive salaries and awesome perks/benefits, and are a few blocks from 4th/King Caltrain & BART.

Ideal candidates must be in (or willing to relocate to) the Bay Area. We are currently seeking engineers for: Frontend, Security, Data Scientist, Full-Stack, DevOps, iOS, Android.

Do you want to help build the next generation identity platform, and have fun while doing it? Contact us at jobs@unify.id and mention HN!
